questions.label: Native language(s)
questions.question: Select your native language(s) (Select all that apply)

questions.label: Age
questions.question: Age

questions.label: Sex
questions.question: Select your sex

questions.label: Country of birth
questions.question: What is your country of birth?

questions.label: Country of Residence
questions.question: What country do you currently live in?

questions.label: Field of Occupation
questions.question: What is your general field of occupation?
questions.note: Select 'Other' if necessary

questions.label: Hours of Work In a Week
questions.note: If you are not employed, select '0'
questions.question: How many hours a week do you work?

questions.label: Current Level of Education
questions.note: If you are not a student, simply select 'None'
questions.question: If you are a student, what level of education are you currently taking?

questions.label: Languages learned to fluency
questions.question: Select the language(s) that you have learned to fluency
questions.note: By fluency, we are referring to around a B2 level in the European framework based on the following chart: https://www.coe.int/en/web/common-european-framework-reference-languages/table-1-cefr-3.3-common-reference-levels-global-scale

questions.label: Languages You Actively Studied But Did Not Reach B2
questions.question: Select the languages you have studied before (and/or are currently studying) but did not reach a B2 level in

questions.label: Languages You Actively Study
questions.question: Select the target languages that you are currently actively studying (Select all that apply)

questions.label: Target Language That You Will Focus On For This Survey
questions.question: While we would like to ask the same questions for every target language you are actively studying, that would make the survey too long. Please select one target language of yours to focus on for the remainder of this survey.
questions.note: In following questions, when we ask about 'your target language,' we are referring to the language you select for this question. If you are only actively studying one language, then simply select that language.

questions.label: Months Studying Target Language
questions.question: How many months have you been studying your target language (including before starting immersion-based/MIA-inspired study)

questions.label: Months Studying Target Language Using Immersion-based Learning
questions.question: How many months have you been studying your target language using immersion-based learning?

questions.label: Description of Studies in Target Language Before MIA
questions.question: Describe your studies in your target language before immersion-based learning?
questions.note: Please include any relevant links or information about methods/sources you used

questions.label: Motivation For Learning Target Language
questions.question: What are your motivations for learning your target language? (Select all that apply)

questions.label: Biggest Problem when Studying a Foreign Language
questions.question: What is the biggest problem you have when studying a foreign language (in general)
questions.note: This question is not asking about a single target language in particular, such as Japanese, but rather is asking about language learning as a whole.

questions.label: Biggest Difficulty With Your Target Language
questions.question: What is the most difficult part of learning your specific target language?

questions.label: Biggest Emotional Difficulty When Studying Target Language
questions.question: Please describe the biggest emotional hurdles you have come across while pursuing your target language

questions.label: Biggest Problem With Tools For Immersion Learning
questions.question: Please describe the biggest problem you have with the tools you use for immersion-based learning
questions.note: This question is trying to identify pain points people have with the tools that are commonly promoted for immersion-based learning

questions.label: Hours Spent Daily on Computer
questions.question: How many hours do you spend on a desktop computer each day?

questions.label: Hours Spent Daily on Smartphones
questions.question: How many hours do you spend on a smartphone each day?
questions.note: This question is trying to identify pain points people have with the tools that are commonly promoted for immersion-based learning

questions.label: Hours Spent Daily on Tablet
questions.question: How many hours do you spend on a tablet each day?
questions.note: This question is trying to identify pain points people have with the tools that are commonly promoted for immersion-based learning

questions.label: Learns pitch accent when learning words in Japanese
questions.question: Do you learn a word's pitch accent when learning words in Japanese? (If your target langauge is not Japanese, simply answer 'No')

questions.label: Resources Used to Study Kanji/Hanzi
questions.question: What resources did you use to study Kanji/Hanzi (Feel free to leave blank if your target language is neither Japanese nor Chinese)

questions.label: Hours Per Week Engaging With Language Learning Communities
questions.question: On average, how many hours per week do you spend engaging with language learning communities?
questions.note: By language learning communities, we are referring to things like the MIA Discord, language learning online forums, etc

questions.label: Feeling About Time Spent In Language Learning Communities
questions.question: How do you feel about the amount of time you spend in language learning communities? (1 - I spend nowhere near enough time  and I want to spend more time in them; 5 - I spend way too much time engaging in language learning communities)

questions.label: Time In Language Learning Communities Benefits Studies
questions.question: Do you feel that the time you spend in language learning communities benefits your language learning studies? (1 - very detrimental to my studies; 5 - very beneficial to my studies)

questions.label: Enjoys The Time Spent in Language Learning Communities
questions.question: Do you enjoy the time spent in language learning communities (1 - not at all; 5 - most definitely)

questions.label: Language Learning Communities You Engage With
questions.question: How helpful do you find consuming content about language learning is?

questions.label: MIA Helps Achieve Language Learning Goals
questions.question: Do you feel that MIA helps in your language learning pursuits? (via addons, YouTube, etc) (1 - not helpful at all; 5 very helpful)

questions.label: Feedback on What MIA Does Well
questions.question: Do you have feedback on what MIA does exceptionally well?

questions.label: Feedback on What MIA Does Poorly
questions.question: Do you have feedback on what MIA does poorly?

questions.label: Ideal Direction for MIA
questions.question: In your eyes, what is the ideal direction for MIA?
questions.note: This question is for us to better understand what people would like to see from MIA in the future.

questions.label: Used Anki Before
questions.question: Have you used Anki before?

questions.label: Using Anki In Studies
questions.question: Are you currently using Anki in your studies?

questions.label: Time Studying With Anki
questions.question: Roughly how long have you been using Anki (even if you do not use Anki anymore, please count the time where you have studied with Anki)
questions.note: If your answer is not an option, such as 1.5 years, simply round down to the closest option, such as 1 year

questions.label: Languages Studied With Anki
questions.question: What languages have you studied with Anki? (Select all that apply)

questions.label: Collection Contains Active Cards Aside from Target Language
questions.question: Does your Anki collection contain active cards aside from cards related to your target language?
questions.note: This question is simply for us to know if your Anki collection not only contain your Japanese cards, for example, but also contains your Spanish cards or computer science cards

questions.label: Daily New Card Goal
questions.question: How many new cards do you aim to learn daily?

questions.label: Total Sentence Cards
questions.question: How many sentence cards have you studied in total?

questions.label: Daily New Sentence Cards
questions.question: How many sentence cards do you learn each day?

questions.label: Total Kanji/Hanzi Cards
questions.question: How many kanji/hanzi cards have you studied in total? (Answer 0 if Japanese/Chinese isn't your target language for this survey)

questions.label: Total Daily Kanji/Hanzi Cards
questions.question: How many kanji/hanzi cards do you study daily? (Answer 0 if Japanese/Chinese isn't your target language for this survey)

questions.label: Total Vocabulary Cards
questions.question: How many vocabulary cards have you studied in total?

questions.label: Daily Vocabulary Cards
questions.question: How many vocabulary cards do you study daily?

questions.label: Total Production/Active Recall Cards
questions.question: How many active recall/production cards have you studied in total?

questions.label: Daily Production/Active Recall Cards
questions.question: How many active recall/production cards do you study daily?

questions.label: Other Types of Cards
questions.question: Do you make any other types of cards aside from vocabulary, sentence, kanji, and production/active recall cards?

questions.label: Enjoy Reviewing Sentence Cards
questions.question: Do you enjoy reviewing sentence cards? (1 - hate it; 5 - love it)

questions.label: Enjoy Reviewing Vocabulary Cards
questions.question: Do you enjoy reviewing vocabulary cards? (1 - hate it; 5 - love it)

questions.label: Enjoy Reviewing Kanji/Hanzi Cards
questions.question: Do you enjoy reviewing kanji/hanzi cards? (1 - hate it; 5 - love it) (select 1 if Japanese/Chinese isn't your target language)

questions.label: Enjoy Reviewing Production/Active Recall Cards
questions.question: Do you enjoy reviewing production/active recall cards? (1 - hate it; 5 - love it)

questions.label: Anki Close Deletion
questions.question: Do you use Anki's cloze deletion feature?

questions.label: Enjoy Making Sentence Cards
questions.question: Do you enjoy making sentence cards? (1 - hate it; 5 - love it)

questions.label: Enjoy Making Vocabulary Cards
questions.question: Do you enjoy making vocabulary cards? (1 - hate it; 5 - love it)

questions.label: Enjoy Making Kanji/Hanzi Cards
questions.question: Do you enjoy making kanji/hanzi cards? (1 - hate it; 5 - love it)

questions.label: Enjoy Making Production/Active Recall Cards
questions.question: Do you enjoy making production/active recall cards? (1 - hate it; 5 - love it)

questions.label: Feeling About Anki
questions.question: How do you feel about Anki overall? (1 - extremely negatively; 5 - extremely positively)

questions.label: Feels Anki is Too Complex
questions.question: Do you feel like Anki is too complex for you? (1 - it is not complex at all; 5 - extremely complex)

questions.label: Prefers Anki To Be Less Complex
questions.question: Do you prefer Anki to be less complex? (1 - No I am satisfied with Anki; 5 - Ideally Anki was much simpler)

questions.label: Often Gets Behind on Anki Reps
questions.question: Do you often get behind on Anki reviews? (1 - Never; 5 - Always)

questions.label: Skips Reps Due To Daily Rep Burden
questions.question: Do you often forego learning new cards due to the burden of reviewing new cards daily? (1 - Never; 5 - Always)

questions.label: Reps Once Or Throughout the Day
questions.question: Do you do your Anki reviews all at once or throughout the day?

questions.label: Time of Day You Review
questions.question: Around what time of day do you normally do your Anki reviews?

questions.label: Does Timeboxing
questions.question: Do you timebox during Anki reviews?

questions.label: Uses Anki subdecks
questions.question: Do you use the Anki subdeck feature?
questions.note: Example image: https://gyazo.com/3a309cc19a48dd928aafb2d5a7a0caab

questions.label: Uses Anki tags
questions.question: Do you use the Anki tag feature? (Note: The tags automatically created by subs2srs do not count)
questions.note: This question is simply for us to understand how you organize your Anki collection and if you personally create tags to organize it

questions.label: Preferred Device for Anki Reviews
questions.question: Which device would you prefer to do reviews on?

questions.label: Uses Low-key Anki
questions.question: Do you use Low-Key Anki?

questions.label: Uses Dictionary Addon
questions.question: Do you use the MIA Dictionary addon?

questions.label: Dictionaries Used With Dictionary Addon
questions.question: What dictionaries do you use with the MIA Dictionary addon?

questions.label: Uses Dictionaries Other Than Included Ones
questions.question: Do you use dictionaries other than that open source dictionaries included with the addon?

questions.label: Uses Other Dictionary Sources on Computer
questions.question: Do you use other dictionary applications/websites on your computer?

questions.label: % of Lookups With Dictionary Addon
questions.question: What percentage of lookups on your computer are with the MIA Dictionary addon?

questions.label: Makes New Cards with Card Exporter
questions.question: Do you make new cards with the dictionary addon's card exporter?

questions.label: Uses Mass Definition Feature
questions.question: Do you use the mass definition exporting feature?

questions.label: Uses MIA Japanese Addon
questions.question: Do you use the MIA Japanese addon?

questions.label: Feeling About MIA Japanese syntax
questions.question: How do you feel about the MIA Japanese addon syntax (e.x 分[わ,わかる;k2]からない)? (1 - hate it; 5 - do not have an issue with it)

questions.label: Uses pitch accent highlighting
questions.question: Do you use pitch accent highlighting with the MIA Japanese addon?

questions.label: Uses Note Types Aside From MIA Japanese Note Type
questions.question: Do you use custom note types aside from the MIA Japanese note type that comes with the addon?

questions.label: Uses MIA Retirement Addon
questions.question: Do you use the MIA Retirement addon?

questions.label: Sentence Card Retiring Interval
questions.question: What retiring interval do you use for sentence cards?
questions.note: Select the retiring interval closest to your actual retiring interval

questions.label: Vocabulary Card Retiring Interval
questions.question: What retiring interval do you use for vocabulary cards?
questions.note: Select the retiring interval closest to your actual retiring interval

questions.label: Kanji/Hanzi Card Retiring Interval
questions.question: What retiring interval do you use for kanji/hanzi cards?
questions.note: Select Never if Japanese/Chinese is not your target language

questions.label: Active Recall Card Retiring Interval
questions.question: What retiring interval do you use for production/active recall cards?
questions.note: Select the retiring interval closest to your actual retiring interval

questions.label: Recalls Retired Card Words During Immersion
questions.question: How well do you recall words from your retired cards when you are immersing? (1 - not well at all; 5 - very frequently (over half the time)

questions.label: Uses Vacation Addon
questions.question: Do you use the MIA Vacation addon?

questions.label: Has Used Vacation Feature
questions.question: Have you used the vacation feature of the addon? (scheduling a vacation, or period of time to have no Anki reviews)

questions.label: Has Used Review Schedule Feature
questions.question: Have you used the review schedule feature of the addon? (selecting which days to review)

questions.label: Review Schedule
questions.question: Which days of the week do you have Anki reviews (as determined by the Vacation addon review schedule feature; Select ALL that apply)

questions.label: Review Schedule Feature Effective
questions.question: Do you find the review schedule feature to be effective? (1 - not at all; 5 - it is perfect)
questions.note: Simply answer 1 if you do not use this feature

questions.label: Has Used Sick Day Feature
questions.question: Have you used the sick day feature of the addon?

questions.label: Sick Day Feature Effective
questions.question: Do you find the sick day feature to be effective? (1 - not at all; 5 - it is perfect)
questions.note: Simply answer 1 if you do not use this feature

questions.label: Has Used Catch Up Feature
questions.question: Have you used the catch up feature of the addon?

questions.label: Catch Up Feature Effective
questions.question: Do you find the catch up feature to be effective? (1 - not at all; 5 - it is perfect)
questions.note: Simply answer 1 if you do not use this feature

questions.label: Uses Morphman
questions.question: Do you use Morphman?

questions.label: Uses Morphman With Subs2Srs Decks
questions.question: Do you use Morphman with a bank of subs2srs cards?

questions.label: Total Cards in Subs2Srs Card Bank
questions.question: How many cards are in your subs2srs card bank? (Answer 0 if you don't use subs2srs card banks)

questions.label: % of subs2srs Decks You Created For Card Bank
questions.question: What percentage of the subs2srs decks for your card bank were made by you? (as opposed to using public, premade subs2srs decks) (answer 0 if you don't use subs2srs card banks)

questions.label: Lets Morphman Choose Words to Learn
questions.question: Do you let Morphman choose which words for you to learn?
